attributes.action: declare any TV & radio broadcasting of the Disasters Emergency Committee appeal for Gaza as an IMPARTIAL humanitarian appeal & INSIST that it is broadcast.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC, ITV, & SKY have refused to broadcast the appeal, since they believe this will manitain their impartiality.
The appeal is for humanitarian reasons only, & NOT political or a propaganda exercise.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
